mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` (order_no, member_no, item_no, order_date) VALUES (NULL, #{loginMemberNo}, #{itemNo}, NOW())
mapper.select:
select od.order_no as orderNo ,mb.member_id as memberId ,ca.category_name as categoryName ,it.item_name as itemName ,it.item_price as itemPrice ,od.order_date as orderDate
from `order` as od
join member as mb using(member_no)
join item as it using(item_no)
join category as ca using(category_no)
where category_no in(select item.category_no from `order` as od
left join item on od.item_no=item.item_no)
ORDER BY od.order_no DESC
limit #{beginRow}, #{pagePerRow}

SELECT COUNT(*) from `order` as od
join member as mb using(member_no)
join item as it using(item_no)
join category as ca using(category_no)
where order_date BETWEEN '${keyword1}' AND '${keyword2}'
where ${searchOption} like CONCAT('%','${keyword}','%')
